action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A round wooden table with a pink purse, two small square boxes with pictures of trees, a bowl, two vases, and a book on top. The table has a rounded edge. The purse is on the table, and the two boxes are in front of it. The bowl is in front of the boxes. The two vases are to the right of the bowl. The book is in front of the vases. The table is made of dark wood. The purse is made of leather and has a buckle on it. The boxes are made of cardboard and have pictures of trees on them. The bowl is made of wood and has a dark brown finish. The vases are made of glass and have a clear finish. The book is made of paper and has a white cover.
continue
